articles.title: Talks between Ri Su Yong and Morozov Anton Held
articles.content:
Talks between Ri Su Yong and Morozov Anton Held
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Talks between Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Morozov Anton Yurevich, member of the Supreme Council and member of the Committee for International Affairs of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, took place here on Wednesday.
					 Ri Su Yong informed Morozov Anton of the fact that the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people are working hard to build a powerful socialist country and achieve a final victory in the confrontation with the U.S. in order to implement the tasks put forward at the 7th Congress of the Party, firmly united around Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea. He underlined the need to further develop the friendly ties between the two parties in the idea of anti-imperialism and independence.
					
					 Morozov Anton said that the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia extended invariable solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to frustrate the U.S. vicious moves for stifling the DPRK and achieve the independent development of the country.
					
					 He also said that the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia considered the statement issued by Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, on September 21, 2017 to be important significance, and positively supported the friendly heroic Korean people struggling to defend their rights to existence and development, standing against the U.S. sanctions and pressure.

articles.title: Russian Party Delegation Feted
articles.content:
Russian Party Delegation Feted
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea gave a reception on Wednesday for a delegation of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia on a visit to the DPRK.
					 Present there on invitation were members of the delegation of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia led by Morozov Anton Yurevich, member of the Supreme Council and member of the Committee for International Affairs of the Party, and Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 On hand there were Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Yong Chol, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, and other officials of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Delegation of Russian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Delegation of Russian Political Party
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift of a delegation the visiting Liberal Democratic Party of Russia.
					 The gift was conveyed to Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Wednesday by head of the delegation Morozov Anton Yurevich, member of the Supreme Council and member of the Committee for International Affairs of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Cemeteries of Martyrs
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Cemeteries of Martyrs
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery on Wednesday, the Harvest Moon Day.
					 Wreaths in the name of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, were seen on the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were Pak Yong Sik, Kim Yong Chol, Choe Pu Il and others, the chairman of the friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, cabinet, working people's organizations, commissions, ministries and national institutions and service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and working people in the city.
					
					 Wreaths in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet were laid on the wreath-laying stands of the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri, and a wreath in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK on the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes" at the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery.
					
					 Laid before the cemeteries were wreaths in the names of the armed forces organs, working people's organizations, commissions, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and KPISF, institutions of science, education, public health and media, and party and power organs, enterprises, universities and farms in the city.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to the martyrs and looked round the cemeteries.
					
					 On the same day wreaths were placed before the statues and cemeteries of the martyrs and monuments to the fallen fighters of the KPA across the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Mali
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Mali
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greeting from Ibrahim Boubacar Keita, president of the Republic of Mali, on Sept. 9.
					 The message extended the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the Korean people on the national holiday of the DPRK on behalf of the people and president of Mali.
					
					 It sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and the friendly Korean people greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: 12th Int'l Seminar on Struggle against Neo-liberalism Held
articles.content:
12th Int'l Seminar on Struggle against Neo-liberalism Held
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The 12th international seminar on the struggle against neo-liberalism took place in Rio de Janeiro from Sept. 20 to 23 under the sponsorship of the Marxist-Leninist Communist Party of Brazil.
					 Attending the meeting were public figures of all social standings and citizens of Brazil.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Brazil and other foreign diplomatic envoys and media persons.
					
					 At the seminar the statement of the chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK was read out by the DPRK ambassador.
					
					 Then speeches were made.
					
					 The Venezuelan consul general in Brazil extended warm congratulations to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un leading the anti-imperialist and anti-U.S. struggle of the Korean people to victory on behalf of the government and people of Venezuela.
					
					 The Cuban consul general said that the Communist Party of Cuba and the government and the people of Cuba sent invariable solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people for safeguarding the sovereignty and security of the country.
					
					 The Bolivian consul general noted that the struggle of the heroic Korean people was greatly encouraging the Bolivian people in the struggle to foil the threat of the U.S. and achieve the development of the country.
					
					 The general secretary of the Marxist-Leninist Communist Party of Brazil said that the Brazilian people firmly supported the anti-U.S. struggle of the Korean people.
					
					 The chairman of the Brazilian Center for the Study of Songun Politics and other personages said that the statement of Marshal Kim Jong Un helped rev up the atmosphere of the seminar to the maximum and made a great contribution to ensuring its success.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. as Chieftain of Escalating Situation on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. as Chieftain of Escalating Situation on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday stresses in an article that the U.S. can never evade the responsibility for spawning the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula and escalating tension with no tactics.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The U.S. says very often that the "world peace is being destroyed" owing to the DPRK's "threat" and "provocation" and it is necessary to take a tougher measure to prevent it through the world community's cooperation.
					
					 It cooked up the unprecedented "sanctions resolution" for stifling the DPRK through the operation of voting machine at the UN. It is getting more talkative about "warning message" while frequently conducting various military exercises against the DPRK by introducing huge forces for aggression into the Korean peninsula.
					
					 However, Trump's hysteric remarks calling for completely destroying the DPRK on the U.N. platform clearly prove that he is the arch criminal escalating tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Trump's remarks clearly show the reason why the U.S. has occupied south Korea for more than 70 years and frantically staged nuclear war exercises while persistently introducing huge nuclear strategic assets in south Korea and its vicinity.
					
					 His intention is to completely destroy the DPRK and exterminate the whole Korean nation.
					
					 There are many invaders ill-famed in brutality and cruelty in the world war history but no criminal such as the U.S. that said it will exterminate a country and nation on our planet.
					
					 The U.S. is, indeed, the chieftain of aggression who spends times with war exercises against the DPRK, arch criminal in provocation and threat and mastermind of harassing peace.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules U.S. Death-bed Struggle
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules U.S. Death-bed Struggle
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Days ago, U.S. war maniac Trump signed a new "executive order on sanctions on north Korea" and hurled again mud at the DPRK tweeting that it "will not last long."
					 The House of Representatives passed what they called "north Korean human rights reauthorization act" to do harm to the DPRK.
					
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. imperialist trigger-happy elements sent a formation of strategic bombers B-1B into the sky over the international waters in the East Sea of Korea, perpetrating a dangerous military provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 This is just silly behavior of those who lost elementary ability necessary to understand the trend of the times, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a commentary.
					
					 No matter what bluffing the U.S. may make, it can hardly cover its miserable fate it is facing in the standoff with the DPRK, it says, adding:
					
					 The U.S. imperialist war maniacs should remember that they will only meet a barrage of nuclear strike if they continue to behave mischievously sending such strategic bombers in face of the DPRK's revolutionary armed forces fully ready to open fire of retaliation.
					
					 The U.S. is getting ever-more frantic with anti-DPRK sanctions and moves to provoke a nuclear war targeting it but they can never do harm to the DPRK's formidable national power and strategic position.
					
					 Whenever the enemy struggles desperately, the Korean army and people will surely win a final victory in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development, closely rallied behind their leader.
					
					 History will see how the Korean army and people punish the U.S. imperialists in the standoff.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Forces Wholly to Blame for Tension on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Forces Wholly to Blame for Tension on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The United States and the south Korean puppet forces are wholly to blame for the extremely escalating tension on the Korean peninsula, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary. 
					 Much upset by the fact that the DPRK's overall national power and strategic position have reached the highest level, the U.S. is more desperately resorting to sanctions and military threat and blackmail against the DPRK, noisily trumpeting about "threat from the north."
					
					 In the wake of cooking up the harshest "sanctions resolution" in history through the operation of voting machine some time ago, the U.S. is again talking about "military option" in a desperate bid to do harm to the DPRK.
					
					 Against this backdrop war maniac Trump let out unprecedented reckless remarks calling for "completely destroying" the DPRK some time ago, revealing the scenario for a nuclear war at any cost.
					
					 Toeing the U.S. line and confrontation with the compatriots in the north, the south Korean puppet forces pressed the additional deployment of THAAD, terming the DPRK's measures for bolstering up the nuclear force for self-defence "provocation" and "threat." Welcoming Trump's war outbursts, they are begging for the deployment of nuclear strategic assets and massively introducing latest war hardware.
					
					 Crying out for "maximum pressure" and "harshest sanctions against the north," they are colluding with foreign forces in an international campaign for sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK.
					
					 The prevailing situation clearly shows the whole nation can neither get rid of the danger of a nuclear war nor pave the way of independent reunification unless an end is put to the U.S. aggression and interference and the anti-reunification forces of south Korea are thrown overboard.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Japan's Wicked Design
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Japan's Wicked Design
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Japanese Foreign Minister Kono said at meetings with diplomatic officials of various countries that "it is important to put the biggest pressure upon the DPRK" and "necessary to put unprecedented pressure of a fresh stage through the world community's unity at present".
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this is reckless acts of militarists to accelerate militarism by positively joining the U.S. in its pressure against the DPRK and attain their sinister political purpose even by driving the land of Japan to crisis.
					
					 The commentary discloses the purpose of the Japanese high-ranking officials who talk about infeasible "pressure". It goes on:
					
					 Their purpose is to draw waters to their mill by escalating tension on the Korean peninsula and acting at the U.S. beck and call.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are seeking to calm down the people's discontents against the government by escalating the situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 They are working hard to instill the necessity of turning Japan into a military giant into the people under the pretext of "nuclear and missile threat" from the north and create an international climate favorable for legally invading other countries.
					
					 Their act of fishing in troubled waters when tension is escalating on the Korean Peninsula is a deed of a blind.
					
					 If a nuclear war breaks out on the Korean Peninsula, the land of Japan, a logistic base and advanced base of the U.S., will become the DPRK's primary target.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to think twice and be prudent, aware of the disaster.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Exposes U.S. Purpose for Increasing Military Spending
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Exposes U.S. Purpose for Increasing Military Spending
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Recently, the U.S. Senate passed the bill on allotting 700 billion U.S. dollars for military spending for fiscal year 2018, nearly 100 billion dollars more than those of the last fiscal year. Meanwhile, the U.S. set up a permanent military base in Israel for the first time.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary says in this regard:
					
					 This is a revelation of the U.S. invariable ambition for dominating the world.
					
					 The U.S. military spending is more than what world's major military powers put together. But it is steadily increasing its military spending. This is because the U.S. ruling quarters are seized with such megalomania as dominating the world.
					
					 Typical of this is that it is increasing nuclear submarines while trumpeting about strategic advantages over military powers in the Asia-Pacific region, including Russia and China.
					
					 It is claiming it would contain its potential rivals with huge nuclear attack capabilities while "quietly sailing" across all seas of the world.
					
					 Its moves to modernize nuclear weapons and develop new tactical nuclear weapons are not exception.
					
					 Besides, the U.S. forces' military operations in Middle East including Afghanistan, Iraq and Syria requiring a large sum of money, and moves for establishing global missile defense system are being prompted by the U.S. ambition for dominating the world.
					
					 The U.S. setting up of its first permanent military base in Israel is arousing bigger concern of the world community. The U.S. is seeking to realize its strategy for dominating Middle East by taking hold on Israel as major military base.
					
					 It is nonsensical for such ringleader of aggression to talk about "international peace".

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses Sinister Intention of "Kukmin Party" Clan Paired with Conservative Opposition
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses Sinister Intention of "Kukmin Party" Clan Paired with Conservative Opposition
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Days ago, An Chol Su clan of "Kukmin Party" of south Korea paired with some members of "Parun Party" formed an organization of "political solidarity" called "national unity forum".
					 Minju Joson on Wednesday denounces this is a filthy political conspiracy between the two opposition party clans criticized as "political parties of migratory birds" and "clubs of traitors".
					
					 The commentary says that the "Kukmin Party" and "Parun Party" which cooked up the "national unity forum" are openly vociferating that they would draw up "policies" and bills representing their political interests and introduce them to the "National Assembly" and counter the "policies" of the present authorities with their united stand. It goes on:
					
					 This shed light again on sinister nature of An Chol Su and "Kukmin Party" that vociferated about "new policy" and "innovations," not hesitating to do anything for their party interests and ambition for power.
					
					 The reckless behavior of the "Kukmin Party" group that formularized the political conspiracy with the "Parun Party" is the filthy treachery against the candlelight holders and supporters in Jolla Provincial area requesting the abolition of evils left by the conservative regime.
					
					 The sinister intention of An Chol Su and "Kukmin Party" is to put the stagnant party under control, demonstrate their existence in "elections to the local self-governing bodies" next year, put break on the "state management" of the present authorities and win the next term's "presidential election" by pairing with conservative opposition party.
					
					 The reality clearly shows that it is not fortuitous that many people called An Chol Su as a "man of ambiguous attitude" after his appearance in the political camp.

articles.title: S. Korean Workers Call for Totally Scrapping Part-time Jobs
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers Call for Totally Scrapping Part-time Jobs
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- South Korean workers held a rally in Seoul on Sept. 28 at which they expressed their will to fight till the day when part-time jobs are abolished, according to a report.
					 Dismissed workers have launched a strike in Samchok of south Korean Kangwon Province in March.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Calls for Defending Peace
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Calls for Defending Peace
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The Taejon Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration held an emergency press interview before the Taejon City Office on Sept. 28 at which it called for national cooperation for peace against war, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 Speakers said the U.S. is to blame for the acute military tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 What the candle-light demonstrators demand is not a war bringing death but peace defending the life of the people, they noted.
					
					 A press release was read out.
					
					 At the end of the press interview the participants launched a demonstration opposing war and THAAD and demanding the conclusion of a peace agreement.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Calls for Defusing Danger of War
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Calls for Defusing Danger of War
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The Kyonggi Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration held a press interview at the Kyonggi Provincial "Assembly" on Sept. 27 at which it expressed the will to fight against the U.S. war moves, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 Speakers demanded the U.S. withdraw its hostile policy aimed to stifle the north and come out for concluding a peace treaty.
					
					 A press release was read out.
					
					 It said that the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are the starting points and landmarks.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Stages Demonstrations against Trump's Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Stages Demonstrations against Trump's Reckless Remarks
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Youth Solidarity staged demonstrations in different areas on Sept. 29 to denounce the reckless remarks of Trump driving the situation on the Korean peninsula into the worst phase of war, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 Demonstrators said their actions are aimed to oppose war and defend peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 They branded Trump as arms dealer bringing war to the Korean peninsula and selling weapons to south Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Austria
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People" was brought out in booklet by the Alwa & Deil Publishing House of Austria on Sep. 26 ahead of the 72nd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work, published on Oct. 3, Juche 79 (1990), deals with the idea that the leadership of the party is the decisive guarantee for the victory of the socialist cause and clarifies the matter of developing the Workers' Party of Korea into the Juche-type revolutionary party and the basic way of performing the mission and duty of the party as a leadership political body.

articles.title: WPK Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Belarus
articles.content:
WPK Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Belarus
Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A Belarus preparatory committee was formed in Minsk on Sept. 28 to celebrate the 72nd birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 L. Shukolinikov, chairman of the Permanent Standing Committee of the Belarus National Association of Friends of Korean People Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the great exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in founding and consolidating the WPK and to organize colorful political and cultural events.

articles.title: Rinden homenaje a los martires en ocasion de fiesta otonal
articles.content:
Rinden homenaje a los martires en ocasion de fiesta otonal
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ACNC) -- En ocasion de Chusok (fiesta otonal, 15 de agosto lunar), fueron colocadas el dia 4 las ofrendas florales ante el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong, el de Martires Patrioticos en la Comuna de Sinmi y el de Martires de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					Estaban colocadas en esos lugares las ofrendas florales enviadas por Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					En las ceremonias de homenaje participaron, Pak Yong Sik, Kim Yong Chol, Choe Pu Il y otros cuadros del Partido y el Estado, el presidente del partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del Partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, el Consejo de Ministros, las entidades de masas, los comites, los ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Fueron depositadas en las plataformas del Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong y el de Martires Patrioticos en la Comuna de Sinmi las ofrendas florales a nombre comun del CC del PTC, el Comite de Estado, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC. Al pie de la plataforma "Espiritu de Heroes" del Cementerio de Martires de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, fue colocada una ofrenda floral a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC y el Comite de Estado de la RPDC.
					
					Tambien, quedaron depositadas las otras a nombre de las instituciones de las fuerzas armadas, entidades de masas, comites, ministerios, organos centrales, unidades del EPC y del ESIPC, instituciones de ciencia, educacion, salud publica, prensa e informacion y los organismos del partido y el Poder, empresas, universidades, granjas, etc. en esta capital.
					
					Los participantes en los actos guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de los martires quienes glorifican las vidas nobles en la sagrada lucha por la prosperidad de la patria y el avance victorioso de la causa socialista de Juche y recorrieron los cementerios de martires.
					
					El mismo dia, fueron depositadas las ofrendas florales ante las estatuas de bronce de martires, los cementerios, los monumentos de recordacion a los martires de EPC y las tumbas de los martires, erguidos en distintas localidades.

articles.title: CC del PTC ofrece banquete en honor de la delegacion de partido ruso
articles.content:
CC del PTC ofrece banquete en honor de la delegacion de partido ruso
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea ofrecio el dia 4 un banquete en honor de la delegacion del Partido Democratico Liberal de Rusia, de visita en Corea.
					A la ocasion fueron invitados los miembros de la delegacion rusa, encabezada por Morozov Anton Yurevich, miembro del Consejo Supremo y del Comite de Asuntos Internacionales de Relaciones Exteriores del Partido Democratico Liberal de Rusia, y Alexandr Matsegora, embajador de la Federacion Rusa en Corea.
					
					Estuvieron presentes Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del CC de PTC, el subjefe de departamento Ri Yong Chol y otros funcionarios del CC de PTC.
					
					Hubo discursos en la recepcion.

articles.title: Se efectua en Rusia la conferencia de coreanos residentes en ultramar
articles.content:
Se efectua en Rusia la conferencia de coreanos residentes en ultramar
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del decimo aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, se efectuo el 30 de septiembre en Moscu, Rusia, la conferencia de los coreanos residentes en ultramar para apoyar la paz y reunificacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					En el conclave tomaron parte los representantes de las organizaciones de los coreanos residentes en varios paises como la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon), la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en China, la Asociacion de Coreanos en Rusia (Unidad), la Asociacion Nacional de los Coreanos Residentes en Estados Unidos, la Asociacion de los Coreanos Residentes en Canada, el Comite Regional de Europa del Comite Ultramarino para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, la Asociacion de Coreanos en Kazajstan (Unidad), la Asociacion de Coreanos en Uzbekistan (Unidad), etc., asi como los coreanos residentes en Rusia.
					
					Fueron invitados el embajador coreano en Rusia, Kim Hyong Jun, los especialistas en los asuntos coreanos del Instituto de Estudios del Oriente y el Instituto del Extremo Oriente de la Academia de Ciencias de Rusia, los integrantes de la Asociacion de Amistad Rusia-Corea y demas personalidades rusas.
					
					Primero, se presentaron los mensajes de felicitacion y las cartas de solidaridad enviados a la conferencia.
					
					El embajador coreano hizo uso de la palabra de felicitacion.
					
					Kim Chil Song, presidente de la Asociacion de Coreanos en Rusia (Unidad), pronuncio el informe de base y otros intervinieron.
					
					Los oradores subrayaron que la historica Declaracion del 4 de Octubre constituye el inmortal programa para adelantar la reunificacion de la patria, anhelo de la nacion coreana, siendo  la guia de implementacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, cuyo nucleo es el ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					Dijeron en tono emocionante que la publicacion de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre infundio en aquel entonces a todos los coreanos la aspiracion y gran jubilo sobre la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Pero, la actual Peninsula Coreana esta en el estado tan peligrosisimo en que puede estallar en cualquier momento la guerra, apuntaron.
					
					A contrapelo de la aspiracion y opinion de toda la nacion, fue detenida totalmente la ejecucion de las historicas declaraciones conjuntas adoptadas por ambas partes coreanas, y la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se dirige a la coyuntura de guerra, la confrontacion y la division eterna de la nacion, lo cual se debe a la politica hostil de EE.UU. sobre Corea y a las imprudentes maniobras antinacionales y anti-reunificacion de las autoridades surcoreanas, subrayaron.
					
					Afirmaron que respetar y ejecutar cabalmente las declaraciones arriba mencionadas constituyen el remedio mas real para lograr la paz y la reunificacion en la Peninsula Coreana y aseveraron que las autoridades surcoreanas no deben recurrir al obedecimiento a las fuerzas extranjeras, la confrontacion fratricida y las maniobras vendepatrias, sino deben sumarse a la corriente nacional bajo la bandera "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					En el acto fue adoptado el "llamamiento a todos los coreanos residentes en ultramar y a los pueblos amantes de paz del mundo".
					
					La nota aclara que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea intensifica y desarrolla el disuasivo nuclear para defender la soberania, el honor y la dignidad del pais, lo cual constituye un derecho legitimo conveniente a la ley internacional, como lo hacen otros paises del mundo.
					
					Senala que las declaraciones intercoreanas arriba mencionadas devienen un cimiento de la reunificacion de la patria y subraya que reunificar la patria de manera independiente y pacifica bajo la bandera de gran unidad nacional sin permitir la intervencion de cualesquier fuerzas ajenas, es el camino fundamental dirigido a la reunificacion de Corea.
					
					El mismo dia, tuvieron lugar la funcion artistica y un banquete para felicitar la celebracion exitosa de la conferencia.
